content.value:
Thanwa Boonsoongnern (born 1 December 1995), known professionally as The Toys, is a Thai singer, rapper, songwriter, musician and record producer. His song, "Na Nao Tee Laew (Last Winter) went viral, getting him signed to What The Duck record company soon after.

After winning the 9th Overdrive Guitar Contest when he was 18, The Toys added bass, ukulele, piano, keyboards, synthesiser and drums. He writes, arranges, and plays all the instruments, and does the mixing and mastering.

The Toys came from a music family. He is the only son of Nittaya Boonsoongnern, a Thai pop singer from the 80s-90s, and the nephew of transsexual singer, Jern Jern Boonsoongnern.[1]

lyricsTh:
(*) ฉันคงจะตกหลุมรัก เธออีก
Chun kong ja dtok loom ruk tur eek
I’ve probably fallen in love with you again
Có lẽ anh lại say đắm em lần nữa rồi


I just wonder,บางที
I just wonder bahng tee
I just wonder sometimes
Anh chỉ đôi khi thắc mắc

แต่ว่าเธอน่ะใจร้าย แบบนี้
Dtae wah tur na jai rai baep nee
But you’re cruel like this
Nhưng em lại tàn nhẫn đến thế

ฉันก็พูดไม่ออกแต่รู้ว่าไม่ค่อยดีหรอก
Chun gor poot mai auk dtae roo wawh mai koy dee rauk
I can’t speak, but I know it’s not so good
Anh chẳng thể nói ra, dù biết có nói cũng không hay

ตกหลุมรัก เธออีก
Dtok loom ruk tur eek
I’ve fallen in love with you again
Anh lại say đắm em, lần nữa rồi

I just wonder,บางที
I just wonder bahng tee
I just wonder sometimes
Anh chỉ đôi khi thắc mắc

แต่ว่าเธอน่ะใจร้าย แบบนี้
Dtae wah tur na jai rai baep nee
But you’re cruel like this
Nhưng em lại tàn nhẫn đến thế

ฉันก็พูดไม่ออกแต่รู้ว่าไม่ค่อยดีหรอก
Chun gor poot mai auk dtae roo wawh mai koy dee rauk
I can’t speak, but I know it’s not so good

ฉันไม่คิดในชีวิตจะมาหลงรัก
Chun mai kit nai cheewit ja mah long ruk
I never thought I’d fall in love in my life
Anh chưa bao giờ nghĩ trong cuộc đời mình sẽ rơi vào lưới tình

ไม่มีสิทธิ์คิดอะไรแบบนั้นหรอก
Mai mee sit kit arai baep nun rauk
I don’t have the right to think like that
Anh không có quyền gì để mơ tưởng đến

รู้ฉันรู้มันยากจะบอก เธอฉันไม่ควรเอาแต่ใจ ถ้าเธอคิดจะไป
Roo chun roo mun yahk ja bauk tur chun mai kuan ao dtae jai tah tur kit ja bpai
I know, I know it’s difficult to tell, I shouldn’t be selfish if you’re thinking of going
Anh biết, anh biết thật khó để nói, cũng chẳng nên ích kỷ giữ em lại nếu em muốn bỏ đi

แค่เธอยิ้ม มองลงมา ฉันก็เพ้อไปทุกทีทุกเวลา
Kae tur yim maung long mah chun gor pur bpai took tee took welah
You just smile and look down at me, and I fantasize every time, all the time
Chỉ nụ cười và ánh mắt em nhìn anh, đã làm anh mơ mộng cả ngày lẫn đêm

เธอไม่เหมือนใครแต่ฉันคนธรรมดาแต่ถ้าจะเก็บเธอไว้ใครก็คงจะเวทนา
Tur mai meuan krai dtae chun kon tummadah dtae tah ja gep tur wai krai gor kong ja wet nah
You’re unlike anyone else, but I’m an average guy, but if I kept you, who would sympathize with me?
Em là một cô gái xinh đẹp, nhưng anh chỉ là kẻ tầm thường, liệu anh giữ em lại là điều nên tán thưởng?

(*)

แอบดูตอนที่เขา ส่งข้อความ มาบอกเธอ
Aep doo dtaun tee kao song kor kwahm mah bauk tur
I secretly watch as he sends you a text message telling you
Anh âm thầm nhìn hắn ta gửi tin nhắn cho em, bảo rằng

อย่าทำอย่างนี้ ทำอย่างนั้น ฉันก็ได้แต่
Yah tum yahng nee tum yahng nee chun gor dai dtae
Don’t act like this, act like that, I can just
Không được thế này, không được thế kia, anh chỉ có thế..

แอบดูตอนที่เขา ส่งข้อความ มาบอกเธอ
Aep doo dtaun tee kao song kor kwahm mah bauk tur
Secretly watch as he sends you a text message telling you
Anh âm thầm nhìn hắn ta gửi tin nhắn cho em, bảo rằng

อย่างทำอย่างนี้ ทำอย่างนั้น ฉันก็ได้แต่มอง
Yah tum yahng nee tum yahng nee chun gor dai dtae maung
Don’t act like this, act like that, I can just watch
Không được thế này, không được thế kia, anh chỉ có thể âm thầm nhìn thôi.

(*)
